H0.text: Sugar is broken down in the body to release energy.

H1.text: Water is broken down in the body to release energy.

H2.text: Salt is broken down in the body to release energy.

H3.text: Oxygen is broken down in the body to release energy.

A4.text: Nutrients that are commonly used by animal and plant cells in respiration include sugar, amino acids and fatty acids

A5.text: The most common oxidizing agent is molecular oxygen (O2)
